news_header: House prices in Northern Ireland rose 9% in 2024, reaching an average of over £183,000.
news_original_title: Average NI house price reaches 17-year high
news_text: The average house price in Northern Ireland increased by 9% in 2024, reaching over £183,000 by the end of the year. This is the highest average since early 2008, with a slight increase in sales. A lack of new housing supply, partly due to water system restrictions, is contributing to price inflation. New housing supply figures are expected soon.
